txt.en: Protect the workers from being defeated ([placeholder]/3)

Saruman's forces have used their black powder to create an opening at the culvert and have begun to infiltrate through the gap in the wall. 

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Merit Loss:</rgb>
* Worker defeated

<rgb=#FF0000>Moderate Merit Loss:</rgb>
* Too much time has passed before sealing the culvert 
* Every 15 seconds after the initial time penalty
Seal the culvert opening with rocks ([placeholder]/18)

The Orcs have blasted a hole into the culvert upon the wall and are infiltrating through the gap. Assist the Rohirrim workers as they attempt to seal the opening to prevent further enemies from getting through the defences.
